name: GrappleBox - Prototype
description:
Swing around this little playground to explore the funky movement of this prototype!

Controls:

Hold left click: to grapple

press R: to restart

press ESC: to quit 

Credits

Prototype by: Justin "Kabura" Neumann

Music: Foolboymedia "Race Track"

This prototype was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Build a toy (first)"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
